translations: n.自豪（pride 的复数形式）；娇姿（心理学词汇）
vt.以……自豪（pride 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 头等重要的位置；首要地位；傲慢
[古语]排场;虚荣[亦作 pride of the world]
处于…的顶峰(或最佳状态)
清晨的薄雾和阵雨(天晴的预兆)

sentences.sentence: Suarez prides himself on being able to organize his own life.
sentences.translation: 苏亚雷斯为能安排好自己的生活而自豪。

sentences.sentence: Taco Bell prides itself on serving high quality Mexican inspired food with great value.
sentences.translation: 塔可钟以提供高品质、价廉物美的墨西哥式食品而自豪。

sentences.sentence: She prides herself on her dealmaking talents.
sentences.translation: 她以自己的交易天赋为荣。
